special_text:
At the beginning of your upkeep, you may sacrifice any number of Bloods. If you do, put that many loyalty counters on Luuft, Kushabi Exile.
[0]: Create two Blood tokens. [i](They’re artifacts with “{1}, {T}, Discard a card, Sacrifice this artifact: Draw a card.”)[/i]

[-5]: Return target permanent card from a graveyard to the battlefield under your control. If you don’t own that card, sacrifice it at the beginning of your next end step.
